flawed_nl_solution:
It took 8*0.25=<<8*0.25=2>>2 years longer to go from chief to master chief than to get chief
So it takes him 8+2=<<8+2=10>>10 years to become a master chief
That means he took 10+8=<<10+8=18>>18 years to reach master chief from enlisting
So he was in the military for 18+10=<<18+10=28>>28 years
So he was 28+18=<<28+18=64>>64 when he retired
#### 64

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 46, not 64. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
